fields.text: Thank you for calling Babylist in the East Bay, where building your baby registry is as easy and fun as pinning on Pinterest.
To create or manage your Babylist registry, press [INDEX].
To add items from any store to your registry, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our registry creation team.
To edit, share, or view your existing registry, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our registry management team.
For order, shipping, or gift support, press [INDEX].
For questions about gifts you’ve received, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our gift support specialist.
For assistance with orders or shipping, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our order and shipping department.
